terms.definition: Request for Information. A formal process for clarifying information in construction documents.
Shop drawings, material data, samples, and product data. Submittals are required primarily for the architect and engineer to verify that the correct products will be installed on the project.
A written document that modifies the plans and specifications, and/or the price of the construction contract.
A list of items to be completed or corrected by the contractor.
A legal claim against a property for debt.
